verses.verse: Out of the <S%H4615>depths<s%> have I <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord.
<S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>: let your <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
If <S%H3050>you<s%>, Lord, should <S%H8104>mark<s%> <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, who shall <S%H5975>stand<s%>?
But there is <S%H5547>forgiveness<s%> with <S%H3372>you<s%>, that you may be feared.
I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> does <S%H6960>wait<s%>, and in his <S%H1697>word<s%> do I <S%H3176>hope<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> waits for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> more than they that <S%H8104>watch<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: I <S%H8104>say<s%>, more than they that watch for the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> there is <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, and with him is <S%H7235>plentiful<s%> <S%H6304>redemption<s%>.
And he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from all his <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
